abilities.description: (PASSIVE)DRAGON PRACTICEHitting champions with Abilities and killing enemies with Super Scorcher Breath grants a stack of Dragon Practice. Stacks increase the damage of Smolders basic Abilities.
abilities.name: DRAGON PRACTICEH

abilities.description: (Q)SUPER SCORCHER BREATHSmolder breathes fire on an enemy. As he gains more stacks, this ability becomes more powerful.
abilities.name: SUPER SCORCHER BREATHS

abilities.description: (W)ACHOOO!Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.
abilities.name: ACHOOO

abilities.description: (E)FLAP, FLAP, FLAPSmolder takes flight ignoring terrain and attacking the lowest health enemy.
abilities.name: FLAP

abilities.description: (R)MMOOOMMMM!Smolder calls his mom to breath fire from above, dealing extra damage and slowing enemies in the center of her fire.
abilities.name: MMOOOMMMM
